== Development Tool Dependencies ==

The TREX developer Tools are written in Python and (currently) use GTK for windowing and Cairo for 2D graphics rendering.

*NOTE: Most of these paackages have their own dependencies*

|| *Package* || *Website* || *Download* ||
|| pyGTK || http://www.pygtk.org/ || _Package Manager_ ||
|| pycairo || http://cairographics.org/pycairo/ || _Package Manager_ ||
|| XDot || http://code.google.com/p/jrfonseca/wiki/XDot || _SVN_ ||
|| GvGen || http://software.inl.fr/trac/wiki/GvGen || _SVN_ ||
|| PyGTKCodeBuffer || http://code.google.com/p/pygtkcodebuffer || _SVN_ ||
